property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike {R}, {T}: Attacking creatures gain first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No matter where you find them, goblins love rocks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may exile two green cards from your hand rather than pay Allosaurus Rider's mana cost. Allosaurus Rider's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus the number of lands you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Forests you control are 1/1 green Elf creatures that are still lands. {1}{G}, Sacrifice an Elf: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another Goblin you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may have Boggart Shenanigans deal 1 damage to target player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Boggarts revel in discovering new sensations, from the texture of an otter pellet to the squeak of a dying warren mate.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Sacrifice a Goblin: Clickslither gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The least popular goblins get the outer caves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Elvish Eulogist: You gain 1 life for each Elf card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No matter how adept our artistic skill, our effigies can never hope to capture the vibrant beauty of a living elf. Perhaps that is truly why we mourn."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Elvish Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Elf card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield for each Elf you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The faultless and immaculate castes form the lower tiers of elvish society, with the exquisite caste above them. At the pinnacle is the perfect, a consummate blend of aristocrat and predator.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My tales of war are the stories most asked for around the fires at night, but they're the ones I care least to tell."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Emberwilde Augur: Emberwilde Augur deals 3 damage to target player. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Legends say a djinn gave the goblins a gift they could never hope to master.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {7}{R}: Flamewave Invoker deals 5 damage to target player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Inside even the humblest goblin lurks the potential for far greater things—and far worse.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Forgotten Cave enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. Cycling {R} ({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Gempalm Incinerator, you may have it deal X damage to target creature, where X is the number of Goblins on the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cycling {2}{G}{G} ({2}{G}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Gempalm Strider, Elf creatures get +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}{R}, {T}: Target Goblin creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Goblin Cohort can't attack unless you've cast a creature spell this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Akki shells provided good protection when downhill charging became headlong tumbling.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Goblin Matron enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's always room for one more.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste When Goblin Ringleader enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Goblin cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a Goblin: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let's play ‘sled.' Here's how it works: you're the sled."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Goblin spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Goblin creatures you control have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They poured from the Skirk Ridge like lava, burning and devouring everything in their path.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life's greatest lessons don't come from focus or concentration. They come from breathing and simply noticing."—Seton, centaur druid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Heedless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves on the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another Goblin you control becomes blocked, sacrifice it. If you do, it deals 4 damage to each creature blocking it. Sacrifice two Mountains: Put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1. {G}, {T}: Put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a culture of beauty, the most beautiful are worshipped as gods.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot.—Llanowar penalty for trespassing

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the highest tiers of Dawn's Light Palace to the deepest shade of Wren's Run, the silver notes of the horn shimmer through the air, and all who hear it feel its pull.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: Mogg Fanatic deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I got it! I got it! I—"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Echo {1}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Mogg War Marshal enters the battlefield or dies, put a 1/1 red Goblin creature token onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Moonglove Extract: Moonglove Extract deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Diluted, moonglove can etch living tissue. Concentrated, a drop will kill a giant.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Mudbutton Torchrunner dies, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The oil sloshes against his skull as he nears his destination: the Frogtosser Games and the lighting of the Flaming Boggart.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Reckless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Goblins on the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Siege-Gang Commander enters the battlefield, put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield. {1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Skirk Drill Sergeant or another Goblin dies, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a Goblin permanent card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from red Tap five untapped Goblins you control: Skirk Fire Marshal deals 10 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He's boss because he's smart enough to get out of the way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a Goblin: Add {R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I like goblins. They make funny little popping sounds when they die."—Braids, dementia summoner

property.name: Rules
property.value: Skirk Shaman can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or red creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a shaman's grimy hands, a concoction of dried Skirk Ridge herbs can become the face of panic.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}, {T}, Discard your hand: Draw a card for each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The pattern of life can be studied like a book, if you know how to read it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Within each of you is the strength of a landslide."—Kumano, to his pupils

property.name: Rules
property.value: {7}{G}: Stonewood Invoker gets +5/+5 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Mirari pulses in his veins.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.) When Sylvan Messenger enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Tar Pitcher deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Auntie Grub had caught a goat, a bleating doe that still squirmed in her arms. At the same time, her warren decided to share with her a sensory greeting of hot tar . . . ."—A tale of Auntie Grub

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tarfire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "After Auntie brushed the soot from her eyes, she discovered something wonderful: the fire had turned the goat into something that smelled delicious."—A tale of Auntie Grub

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even through the Mirari's voice, the elves still hear the call of their kinship.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tranquil Thicket enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. Cycling {G} ({G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap five untapped Elves you control: Put a 7/7 green Elemental creature token with trample onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ritual of making draws upon the elves' memories and pasts. And elves have long memories and ancient pasts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: You gain 1 life for each Elf on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Close your ears to the voice of greed, and you can turn a gift for one into a gift for many."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Two times the size, four times the smell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Wirewood Herald dies, you may search your library for an Elf card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The goblins laughed as the elf ran away, until more came back.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {G}, {T}: Untap target Elf.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return an Elf you control to its owner's hand: Untap target creature. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every branch a crossroads, every vine a swift steed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast Wren's Run Vanquisher, reveal an Elf card from your hand or pay {3}. Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
